item.title: I Spy a Dinosaur’s Eye Schrd – Jean Marzollo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Brand new for beginning readers: An I Spy Reader with picture clue riddles! All-new, easy-to-read riddles by Jean Marzollo are paired with fun photographs culled from previously published I Spy books to create an I Spy easy reader. With rhythm, rhyme, and picture clues, this book is written to support the newest reader.

The post I Spy a Dinosaur’s Eye Schrd – Jean Marzollo appeared first on Hoardible.

item.title: Write-on Wipe-Off: Let’s Write Numbers – Highlights
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
The reusable write-on wipe-off pages and wipe-clean marker provide endless hours of learning fun with puzzles and activities that help build math skills and lifelong learning confidence. Identifying numbers and counting are important steps toward math readiness, and Highlights (TM) infuses Fun with a Purpose (R) into this essential learning activity. With vibrant art and […]

The post Write-on Wipe-Off: Let’s Write Numbers – Highlights appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
The reusable write-on wipe-off pages and wipe-clean marker provide endless hours of learning fun with puzzles and activities that help build math skills and lifelong learning confidence.

Identifying numbers and counting are important steps toward math readiness, and Highlights (TM) infuses Fun with a Purpose (R) into this essential learning activity. With vibrant art and engaging prompts, Write-On Wipe-Off Let’s Write Numbers exposes kids to numbers 0 – 20 through counting practice and the fun of puzzles and other activities. With write-on, wipe off pages, children can familiarize themselves with and practice writing numbers over and over, plus complete a variety of activities, such as Hidden Pictures (R) and That’s Silly!(TM) puzzles, that reinforce the learning fun again and again.

The post Write-on Wipe-Off: Let’s Write Numbers – Highlights appeared first on Hoardible.

item.title: I will Teach You to Be a Good Girl : The Adventures of Little Kim – Palmer Christopher (Abridged)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Little Kim is a five-year old curly-haired girl who loves to learn new things and to help out. The Adventures of Little Kim is a collection of stories that teaches children good morals and shows that kids can be very smart and very helpful to their parents, to other people and even to the environment.A […]

The post I will Teach You to Be a Good Girl : The Adventures of Little Kim – Palmer Christopher (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
Little Kim is a five-year old curly-haired girl who loves to learn new things and to help out. The Adventures of Little Kim is a collection of stories that teaches children good morals and shows that kids can be very smart and very helpful to their parents, to other people and even to the environment.A Sneak Peek Into This Episode: Bullies can be meanies sometimes and they’re not fun to play with or be friends with. Ari has bullied Little Kim for a long time but she never fought back. One day, with her mom’s advice, Little Kim decides to teach Ari to be a nicer, kinder person so she could make more friends. Very soon they become best friends. In this episode, Little Kim teaches how to deal with bullies, and how to help them become friendly people.Want to find out more? Keep reading and keep up with the adventures of Little Kim.

The post I will Teach You to Be a Good Girl : The Adventures of Little Kim – Palmer Christopher (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
